title: Poetic Justice
blurb: InteractiveSpoken Word Poetry in Virtual Reality
content_html:
Inspiration Millenials, housing affordability , and the struggle to reach the American dream.

What it does Involves the consumer in a powerful and interactive narrative that is entertaining , emotional , and empathic.

How we built it VR Video with Theta, Premier, , Drop Box, and H4n Zoom Field recorder and Creative Commons Music

Challenges we ran into: Conversion and time, and people having other obligations

Accomplishments that we're proud of: I submitted something :-)

What we learned: That VR video is fun , and more complicated than I expected

What's next for Poetic Justice: Keep creating and getting better with VR film. Learn how to use Unity to make the film more interactive , powerful, and educational.
